comments: Failed Math all the way through high school, and it has been 10+ yrs since then. Joe has been the first math teacher I have actually liked. He explained the material in a way that was easy for me to grasp. Had him for math 21, enjoyed his class so much, I went out of my way to make sure I had him again for math 91! 10/10 would recommend/take again!
